name: Entity Creation Tracking
description: Servers MUST track newly created entities during mutation execution and include them in the cascade response

input.mutation: mutation CreateUser($input: CreateUserInput!) { createUser(input: $input) { id name email } }

context.schema: type Mutation { createUser(input: CreateUserInput!): User } type User { id: ID! name: String! email: String! } input CreateUserInput { name: String! email: String! }
